text:
Smaato is hiring in Hamburg (Germany)

Smaato is the leading global mobile RTB ad exchange (SMX) helping mobile app developers and publishers increase ad revenues worldwide.

We have several open positions:

Python Developer: https://www.smartrecruiters.com/SmaatoInc/82714895-python-de...

Senior JavaScript Developer: https://www.smartrecruiters.com/SmaatoInc/83156443-senior-ja...

Data Engineer: https://www.smartrecruiters.com/SmaatoInc/83097577--senior-b...

Java Developer: https://www.smartrecruiters.com/SmaatoInc/82682998-senior-ja...

Senior Systems Engineer: https://www.smartrecruiters.com/SmaatoInc/83038702-senior-sy...

Check out our career page! https://www.smaato.com/jobs/hamburg/
